short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Optimize your Upwork bids with Upwork Analytics! Gain insights, enhance strategies, and win more projects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upwork Analytics Tool - Transform how your team bids on Upwork. Designed to fill the gap in Upwork's team collaboration capabilities, our Chrome extension provides a comprehensive view of your bidding process. Track all aspects of your proposals, from initial quotations to final negotiations, and gain insights into each team member's contributions. Our intuitive dashboard lets you pinpoint successful strategies and correct missteps, fostering continuous improvement. Equip your team with the tools they need to collaborate effectively and win more projects on Upwork.
